mapper.select: SELECT id, name, acl_id, owner_id, parent_id, type_id, metadata_changed, created, CASE WHEN ((select count(*) from folders subfolers where subfolers.parent_id=f.id limit 1) > 0) THEN true ELSE false END as has_subfolders, CASE WHEN #{includeSummary} THEN summary ELSE null END AS summary FROM folders f WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} AND name = #{name}

with recursive fp (id, parent_id, name, ids) as ( select id, parent_id, name, array [id] from folders f where f.parent_id is null union all select child.id, child.parent_id, child.name, array_append(ids, child.id) from folders child join fp on child.parent_id = fp.id where child.parent_id is not null ) select name from fp where array_length(ids, 1) <= (select array_length(ids, 1) from fp where id = #{id}) and ids <@ (select ids from fp where id = #{id})
